scripts.start: run-p build:vendorjs watch:scss watch:js watch:html watch:img browsersync
scripts.build:vendorjs: mkdir -p dist/js && minify src/js/vendor/tobi.js --out-file dist/js/tobi.min.js && minify src/js/vendor/menuspy.js --out-file dist/js/menuspy.min.js && minify src/js/vendor/smoothscroll.js --out-file dist/js/smoothscroll.min.js && minify src/js/vendor/alpine.js --out-file dist/js/alpine.min.js && minify src/js/vendor/alpine.es5.js --out-file dist/js/alpine.es5.min.js
scripts.build:css: node-sass -r src/scss -o .tmp/css --output-style compressed && postcss .tmp/css/**/*.css --use autoprefixer -b '>= 0.75% in US' --base .tmp/css --dir dist/css
